section.title: CryptoTA.Apis.Fees Class Reference

para.para: Class which contains maker and taker fees. Data for both type of fees is included, though in application, only taker fee will be used.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Class which contains maker and taker fees. Data for both type of fees is included, though in application, only taker fee will be used.
